name: Java Paragon Hotel & Residences

reviews.text: This was my second stay at Java Paragon, in November 2011, and since there were 7 of us on a business trip, we took one 3-bedroom apartment unit. We were placed on the 5th floor, room #582. We found that the unit was shabby, the beds and the mattress were old, rather uncomfortable. The air-con in one of the room was not cool enough, also the one in the dining room. When we call the technician, the response was slow and unfriendly. There were no kitchen utensils in the pantry, we had to request. The housekeeping then lent us some frying pans......in a poor condition!
reviews.title: Shabby apartment unit, lousy service

reviews.text: Since this is a 3-bedroom unit plus an extra bed, we were supposed to get 7 bottles of complimentary mineral water each day. Unfortunately, they sometimes only provide 4 - 5 bottles.....and again we had to call the housekeeping to complain.
reviews.title: SMOKING

reviews.text: Hot water often didn't work.......and we had to call the technician (again and again).
reviews.title: Disturbed!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we complain to the receptionist / front line people, they just told us that "It's an old room that hasn't been renovated, therefore you find many problems". Hey, this is a four-star serviced apartment! If you can't meet the standard, don't sell the room!
reviews.title: Good Stay

reviews.text: Very bad hotel to stay in... Even if there is NO SMOKING floor people still smoking and the smokes disturb all the guest on the floor.
reviews.title: A nice hotel for best value
Comfortable room with low services
reviews.text: Overall the hotel is modern and comfortable to stay. The traffic to the hotel is crowded and often jammed. There are no special impression from me when stayed at this hotel. The services are mediocre. The hospitality of front office staffs were standards. The service got worse when I entered the restaurant for breakfast. Restaurant ushers seem hard to gave a smile to the guests. When guests leave the restaurant was no friendly greeting from the restaurant staffs, as we usually encounter in any other five-star hotels.

The hotel security was better, we must have a magnetic room key if we want to operate the elevator. Internet can be found in the room using LAN cable, but the speed was unstable. Rooms quite comfortable and clean. But unfortunately the hotel only provided mineral water with no coffee, tea sugar etc and water heaters.
reviews.title: Good value and service, rooms are small but OK for Surabaya

reviews.text: Attractive facilities of this hotel (although I have not tried) is Citillities Skyclub & Bistro, located on the roof of the hotel, so guests can view from a height of Surabaya city.
reviews.title: Room with broken Air COn

reviews.text: Good value overall but it's not 5 star - only two lifts for 20 floors, smallish rooms and the LAN and Wifi is slow and unreliable. Good gym, pool and food (great Chinese restaurant), nice rooftop bar. Need to book ahead (same as all Surabaya hotels, busy). Friendly staff and well run, I stay there a lot.
reviews.title: Comfortable respite in bustling Surabaya

reviews.text: This hotel has room with broken air cond. Since I checked in late at night, I just realized it at dawn. When checked out, I complaint however the staff just starring and smilling..... no apology or taking initiative to take any positive responsive action.
reviews.title: Excellent...Except for...

reviews.text: Not far from some of the best golf in Surabaya; Bukit Darmo Golf, and Graha Family Golf, it's also across the street from Shangri La Hotel, Surabaya, at half the price, I opted for the Java Paragon.
reviews.title: An enjoyable friendly stay, convenient location in west Surabaya

reviews.text: I would normally stay at JW Marriott or Sheraton while on business in Surabaya, however my customer suggested Java Paragon as it is conveniently located near the highway to their plant. The room and facilities are good for the price, however what make JP stands out is their staff. JP staff struck me as being overly helpful - from the front desk down to the security guards and the bellhops, even non-guest related staff whom I met in the elevator was quite helpful. I felt really comfortable and will definitely stay at JP again in my future trips to Surabaya.
reviews.title: Excellent Experience at Java Paragon in Surabaya.

reviews.text: I would like to say special thanks to Laila Puspasari who helped me when I left an item in my room after checkout. She couriered the item to my next destination quickly with her own money (I reimbursed her later). Also special mention of Doni the security guard at the lobby elevator who always greets everybody.
reviews.title: Affordable Accommodation and Super Clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Their staff performance makes the hotel feels like a 5 star place, even though the building is more like 3.5 star to me.
reviews.title: could be better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Checked in in Aug 2011 and was wowed by the hotel cleanliness. The room was excellent, modern, clean. Food selection was ok, bit pricey. Swimming pool was nice, though windy. Sauna room was good. Highly recommended for weekend escape. Privacy is very good, you have to insert a card to access the guest floor.
reviews.title: Very mixed feelings
Beautiful Hotel And Perfect Staffs...
reviews.text: The hotel is close to the highway which connects Surabaya and its supporting towns, which is ideal for business travelers.
To my experience, I have nothing more to ask of this hotel.... From Facilities to Food and to Staffs... Everything was Fantastic!
reviews.title: Run down outside - but excellent inside

reviews.text: The Environment... The Buffet... The Staffs from Front office to Club Floor to Housekeeping and even the Security was very helpful and courteous.... 3 nights for me wasn't enough to enjoy such treatment... Over all... I would say... Java Paragon is an Awesome Hotel in Surabaya...
reviews.title: Not bad, could be much better

reviews.text: It is well recommended for both Business & Pleasure!
reviews.title: Affordable & good location hotel in Surabaya

reviews.text: Bravo to all the Staffs and Managements!
reviews.title: Value For Money, Exclusive Stay If You Are On A Business

reviews.text: One objection is the service at the restaurant during breakfast. The waitress never offered to fill in your glass with tea/coffee or take out the dirty plates...Really annoying...
reviews.title: Good design room with small bathroom

reviews.text: I like the food, restaurant, for sure the 21th floor cafe is stunning.
reviews.title: One of the Best Business Hotels in Indonesia

reviews.text: Good hotel but unfortunately for its quite small room for executive superior room, especially the bathroom, its only has shower not bathtub.
reviews.title: Really nice place to stay if you need to be in West Surabaya

reviews.text: I stayed at 20th Floor which is good view but I could hear the sound of tables, chairs moving from 21th when the workers prepare to close the restaurant between 10.30PM - 12.00AM. Its quite annoying from me and my wife, good & fast response for the complain.
reviews.title: Real good place for Long term Business people & families

description: Java Paragon Hotel & Residence is a 4 Stars Hotel with a Modern Minimalist design. Only a 20-minute drive from the Juanda International Airport and a 15-minutes drive from the Surabaya central business district. Free Wi-Fi High Speed internet access is available in all rooms, apartments, and public areas.All guest rooms and Apartment units in Java Paragon are well-equipped with a minibar, a hair dryer, and a flat screen TV. 24-hour room service and valet service is also available. Guests of the Java Paragon can exercise in its well-equipped fitness center, a swimming pool, sauna, and a tennis court for guest use.Guest can enjoy cocktails and snacks in The Lounge in Paragon Hotel. The Café Restaurant serves a blend of western and Asian favorites all day. The Executive Lounge is also accessible for those whose staying at Executive Floors and Suites Rooms. The Citilites Skyclub and Bistro with its magnificent city view serves gourmet dishes on the building rooftop terrace in 21st floor.
